# T800 Labs

> Software development company based in Zaragoza, Spain. We build custom web applications, AI integrations, mobile apps, cloud infrastructure, and bespoke software solutions.

## Services

- **Web Development**: Custom websites and web applications using React, Next.js, and full-stack technologies
- **AI & Automation**: AI integrations, chatbots, and business process automation
- **Mobile Apps**: Native and hybrid applications for iOS and Android
- **Cloud & DevOps**: Cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, containers, and automated deployments
- **Custom Software**: Bespoke software solutions for specific business needs

## About

Founded by Rubén Jarné Cabañero, a full-stack developer specializing in AI-assisted development. Based in Zaragoza, Spain, serving clients nationally and internationally.
